articles.title: Turning Point USA founder shot and killed at Utah university
articles.description: The founder of Turning Point USA was shot and killed at a Utah university [2, 3, 4]. Authorities are seeking a person of interest in connection with the shooting [4].

articles.title: NATO scrambles jets to shoot down Russian drones in Poland, raising fears of war spillover
articles.description: NATO scrambled jets after Russian drones entered Polish airspace, increasing concerns about the war in Ukraine spreading [2, 3].

articles.title: Guterres condemns Israeli strike on Hamas leaders in Qatar as 'flagrant violation'
articles.description: The UN Secretary-General condemned an Israeli strike targeting Hamas leaders in Doha, Qatar, calling it a flagrant violation, while acknowledging Qatar's positive role in Gaza ceasefire efforts [5].
